<title level="1" right="Rules">[Bulk Limits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2154)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 269 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can carry an amount of Bulk equal to 5 plus your Strength modifier without penalty; if you carry more, you gain the [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12) condition. You can’t hold or carry more Bulk than 10 plus your Strength modifier.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Encumbered</title>

You are carrying more weight than you can manage. While you’re encumbered, you’re clumsy 1 and take a –10-foot penalty to all your Speeds. As with all penalties to your Speed, this can’t reduce your Speed below 5 feet.
</aside>
name: Bulk Limits
